item.title: Array Helper Methods in ES6
item.description: To become a front end developer means that you must be proficient with javaScript. Especially with manipulation of data. Having worked with multiple API’s myself, most of the time the data I get back is an array of javaScript objects. Thankfully ES6 provides us with a few useful and powerful array helper methods. Most of these array helper methods help with iteration over an array. forEach The forEach loop is one of the most commonly used array helper methods in ES6.
